author: Sam Nicarry
comment: Looks great. Note 4. Marmallow. Moto 360 (2). All permissions on. No heart rate, no working weather, colors change, and analog/digital changes. Let me know when the rest gets working. I would love to have this as my everyday face.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: hi Sam,We are glad you like our watch face,you need to switch on the notification on the phone setting , check this link http://bit.ly/29uMJrW ,also switch on the sensor permission on phone and watch make sure the android wear is up to the date.if you still face this issue pls send a email to wearables@insideglobe.com we will happy to assist you

title: Wish it all (or at least some) features would work

author: Morry Zelcovitch
comment: Update - in addition to the other issues, I had to uninstall the app as it was draining battery power on the phone (LG G4) to the tune of 25% and would not let me simply "stop" it. Heart rate monitor does not work on moto 360 2nd gen. Also aren't the buttons on the outside supposed to be active? I tap them and nothing happens.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Morry ,My sincere apologize our watch face did not meet your expectations, Android Marshmallow users have to enable permissions for Sensors on your phone and in watch to get the heart rate reading and steps count ,You need to give the permission individually,If you still have this issue kindly send us a email to wearables@insideglobe.com

title: Has potential...

author: Neil Parr-Davies
comment: Two days after install and it's consistently number 2 on the list of highest power consuming apps, and my phone no longer makes it past 6pm without charging when before it would last the full day. Avoid.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Neil, Thank you for pointing out the defect,you can switch on/off the sensors heart rate and also the step sensor sure your watch will long hours as we save battery, thank you for your time

title: Don't install, will murder your phone battery

author: B W
comment: I love the layout! I wish options included Hangouts, Glide, Compass, Google Fit Goal/Steps, Swarm, Dialer... basically if it could allow for custom shortcuts to apps/functions on the watch... not on the phone.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Beverly, We really pleased that you love our watch face. Thank you for pointing out the defect.We will try to work on your ideas if possible  and will be covering  all these in our next update ,thank you for your  time

title: Looking forward to more

author: Jeff Raymond
comment: Hmmm. Started getting ads on my phone for CallsApp! sponsored from this watch face app. Update: It's good news to hear that this won't be happening anymore, thanks.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Jeff, Very sorry to hear you've experience this issue from our side, We can assure this wont be happens in future,Thank you for your time

author: Martin Burghall
comment: Used more battery than my anything else on my phone.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Martin,Thank you for pointing out the defect.you can also switch OFF/ON the sensor in you watch to save battery ,If you still face this issue pls send an email to wearables@insideglobe.com we will happy to assist you

title: Battery Killer

author: Cody Wallace
comment: Lock screen and aod doesn't work

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Cody, Very sorry to hear you've experience this issue from our side, Can you describe more about the issue so that we help to fix it soon or send an email to wearables@insideglobe.com ,Thank you for the time

author: Billy
comment: Need black bg ambient. Heart rate sensor not detected on huawei.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Billy,Thank you for pointing out the defect.you need to switch on the notification on the phone setting,check this link http://bit.ly/29uMJrW ,also switch on the sensor permission on phone and watch make sure the android wear is up to the date.if you still face this issue pls send an email to wearables@insideglobe.com we will happy to assist you

title: Ok, could be so much better

author: Jed Dye
comment: Options missing such as 12 or 24 time, time before it goes into ambient mode etc…

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Jed,You can change the time format into 12 hrs or 24 hrs watch setting ,If you still face this issue pls send an email to wearables@insideglobe.com we will happy to assist you

title: Doesn't load

author: Bhaskar Vijay Singh
comment: Drains phone battery for some reason.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Bhasakar, Thank you for pointing out the defect,you can switch on/off the sensors heart rate and also the step sensor sure your watch will long hours as we save battery, thank you for your time

author: Tamás Körözsi
comment: the numbers are too small to read

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Tamas ,Thank you for pointing out the defect.we will soon work on this ,can you please send an screenshots to this email address   wearables@insideglobe.com we will happy to assist you

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Armel, We really pleased that you love our watch face. Thank you for pointing out the defect. We are covering this issue in our future update we will try to fix this as soon as possible, Thanks for your feed back.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi denver, My sincere apologize if our watch face did not meet your expectations,Would you please refer your issue in detail in an email to wearables@insideglobe.com (order number, OS in your android & watches)so that we can process your order soon

author: chris morton
comment: Nice looking watch face. With a few decent updates this could be a cracker. Will be keeping my eye on this one. :-)

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Chris ,We are glad you like our watch face ,we would like to hear you more about it can you pls send us a mail to wearables@insideglobe.com and kindly reconsider your reviews ,Thank you for  the time

title: Got potential

comment: The watchface looks pretty and cool but its not fully compatible with the huawei watch since the heart rate sensor not detected by the watchface and the dim mode is full color without eco mode. In general it needs to be more customizable.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content:
Dear zrubiz,
 Thanks for letting us know about your experience with our watch face and our sincere apologize if our watch face did not meet your expectations. Ambient Mode & and more other important features will be released on the upcoming version very soon. Anyways thanks for your feedback :)

title: Pretty and cool but...
